text: OpenGov is an American technology company based in Redwood City, California. Its service are being used by more than 1,000 cities, counties, and state agencies across 49 states. ==History== It was developed in 2012 by Zachary Bookman, Nate Levine, Dakin Sloss, and Joe Lonsdale to solve the problems arises due to the 2007-2008 economical crisis. ==References== Category:American software companies Category:2012 establishments in the United States Category:Companies based in California
title: OpenGov
